name: cachette
description: Resilient cache library supporting concurrent requests through local cache or Redis.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm install && npm run compile
scripts.test: npm run compile && nyc mocha --config test/mocharc.js 'dist/test/**/*.js'; test -z "$TEST_REDIS_URL" && echo '!!! Warning: TEST_REDIS_URL unset, Redis tests did not run !!!' || true
scripts.test:ci: npm run compile && mkdir -p ci_output/testresults && mocha --config test/mocharc-ci.js 'dist/test/**/*.js'
scripts.relock: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json; npm install --package-lock; npm out; true
scripts.githook-install:
mkdir -p .git/hooks/ && echo '#!/usr/bin/env sh
echo "⚠️ Reminder that cachette is a *public* repo! ⚠️"
echo "No private info in: branch name, commit message, PR title & description & comments!"
echo "Ctrl+C to abort git push, Enter to proceed."
read REPLY < /dev/tty' > '.git/hooks/pre-push' && chmod +x '.git/hooks/pre-push'
